original: yadyasau mantra indrapradhānakakriyāyāḥ sādhako na bhavet,

original: tasmāt 'etanmantrakaraṇakakriyāṃ pratīndraḥ pradhānam' ityetādṛśabuddhyīṃ- tpādanaṃ liṅgaviniyogaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt etad mantra karaṇaka kriyām prati indraḥ pradhānam iti etādṛśa buddhyīm tpādanam liṅga viniyogaḥ

original: 'kāsau kriyā' iti viśeṣajijñāsāyām 'aindyopatiṣṭhate' ityanenāviruddhapada- dvayarūpeṇa vākyenopasthānakriyāyāṃ paryavasānaṃ kriyate /
analyzed: kā asau kriyā iti viśeṣa jijñāsāyām aindyā upatiṣṭhate iti anena aviruddha pada dvaya rūpeṇa vākyena upasthāna kriyāyām paryavasānam kriyate
tathā asati aindra mantreṇa indram upatiṣṭheta iti ayam arthaḥ paryavasyati

original: tathā 'gārhapatyam' iti dvitīyāntapadarūpayā śrutyā gārhapatyasya prādhānyaṃ gamyate /
analyzed: tathā gārhapatyam iti dvitīyā anta pada rūpayā śrutyā gārhapatyasya prādhānyam gamyate
tat ca guṇa bhūtām yat kiṃcitkaraṇaka kriyām antareṇa na saṃbhavati

original: tataḥ 'tādṛśīṃ kāṃcitkriyāṃ prati gārhyatyaḥ pradhānam' ityetādṛśabuddhyīṃtpādanaṃ śrutiviniyogaḥ /
analyzed: tatas tādṛśīm kāṃcid kriyām prati gārhyatyaḥ pradhānam iti etādṛśa buddhyīṃtpādanam śruti viniyogaḥ

original: 'aindyā, upatiṣṭhate' iti padadvayena mantraviśeṣakriyāviśeṣayoḥ paryavasānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: aindyā upatiṣṭhate iti pada dvayena mantra viśeṣa kriyā viśeṣayoḥ paryavasānam bhavati

original: tathā sati 'aindreṇa mantreṇa gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' ityartho bhavati /
analyzed: tathā sati aindreṇa mantreṇa gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti arthaḥ bhavati

original: tadevaṃ śrutiliṅgayorvirodhe sati pramāṇatvāviśeṣādbrīhiyavavadvikalpaḥ- ityekaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam śruti liṅgayoḥ virodhe sati pramāṇa tva aviśeṣāt brīhi yava vat vikalpaḥ iti ekaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: indragārhapatyayoḥ pradhānatvāviśeṣadupasthānasya ca guṇatvāt 'pratipradhānaṃ guṇaḥ' iti nyāyenopasthānāvṛtyā śrutiliṅgayoḥ samuccayaḥ- iti  #
analyzed: indra gārhapatyayoḥ ca guṇa tvāt prati pradhānam guṇaḥ iti nyāyena upasthāna āvṛtyā śruti liṅgayoḥ samuccayaḥ iti

analyzed: aindra mantrasya gārhapatye mukhya vṛttyā śakti abhāve gauṇa vṛttyā śaktiḥ asti iti niveśanaḥ iti asmin udāharaṇe pūrvam eva darśitam

analyzed: yaḥ yam śyenasya aṅgeṣu dṛti navanīta tva guṇaḥ vihitaḥ saḥ yam sutyā kālīneṣu eva savanīya paśu tad puroḍāśa rūpeṣu aṅgeṣu
na tu kāla antara varti dīkṣaṇīya ādi aṅgeṣu
vimataḥ guṇaḥ sutyā kālīna aṅga mātra gaḥ
śyena vaiśeṣika tvāt
paśu sāhitya vat

original: yathā 'saha paśūnālabhate' iti vihitaṃ paśusāhityaṃ śyena eva viśeṣatvenocyamānaṃ sutyākālīneṣveva savanīyapaśuṣvavasthitam,
analyzed: yathā saha paśūn ālabhate iti vihitam paśu sāhityam śyenaḥ eva viśeṣa tvena ucyamānam sutyā kālīneṣu eva savanīya paśuṣu avasthitam
tathā navanītam api iti prāpte
brūmaḥ yat ājyam tat dṛti navanītam iti vākyena sarva aṅga tā ājya viṣaya tva pratītau anumānam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭam
tasmāt sarveṣu aṅgeṣu tat navanītam
trayoviṃśe savanīyānām māṃsa maya tā adhikaraṇe sūtrāṇi
māṃsam tu savanīyānām codanā viśeṣāt
bhaktiḥ asaṃnidhau anyāyyā iti ced
syāt prakṛti liṅgāt vairāja vat
start mjainī
trayoviṃśa adhikaraṇam āracayati
śākyāyane puroḍāśāḥ tarasāḥ iti māṃsa tā

original: sarvatra savanīye vā sarvatra navanītavat // MJaiNy_3,8.33 //
analyzed: sarvatra savanīye vā sarvatra navanīta vat
tarasāḥ savanīyāḥ syuḥ iti tad saṃnidhiḥ śrutaḥ
puroḍāśasya māṃsa tvam teṣu eva atas niyamyate
ṣaṭtriṃśatsu saṃvatsareṣu anuṣṭheyam śākyāyanam
tatra śrūyate saṃsthitaḥ hani gṛhapatiḥ mṛgayām yāti
sa yān mṛgān hanti

original: teṣāṃ tarasāḥ savamīyāḥ puroḍāśā bhavanti' iti /
analyzed: teṣām tarasāḥ savamīyāḥ puroḍāśāḥ bhavanti iti
tatra yathā navanītam sarveṣu aṅgeṣu niviṣṭam

original: tathā māṃsatvamapi sarveṣu puroḍāśeṣu niviśate - iti cet /
analyzed: tathā māṃsa tvam api sarveṣu puroḍāśeṣu niviśate iti ced
mā evam

original: tadā hi 'ye puroḍāśāste tarasāḥ' iti vacanavyaktau vyavahitānvayaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tadā hi ye puroḍāśāḥ te tarasāḥ iti vacana vyaktau vyavahita anvayaḥ syāt
tarasa śabda puroḍāśa śabdayoḥ madhye savanīya śabdena vyavadhānāt

original: iha tu 'tarasāḥ savanīyāḥ' ityanayoḥ saṃnidhiḥ śrūyate /
analyzed: iha tu tarasāḥ savanīyāḥ iti anayoḥ saṃnidhiḥ śrūyate

original: tathā sati 'ye savanīyāste tarasāḥ' ityanena saṃnidhyanugṛhītena vākyena māṃsatvaṃ savanīyapuroḍāśeṣveva niyamyate // MJaiNyC_3,8.33-34 //
analyzed: tathā sati ye savanīyāḥ te tarasāḥ iti anena saṃnidhi anugṛhītena vākyena māṃsa tvam savanīya puroḍāśeṣu eva niyamyate
iti śrī mādhavīye jaiminīya nyāya mālā vistare tṛtīya adhyāyasya aṣṭamaḥ pādaḥ
samāptaḥ ca ayam tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
